home_hero_description: Cloud Programing Online CO., LTD(Win Pro Cloud). focuses on information research and IoT games development machines in Taichung, Taiwan. We combine software, firmware, hardware and cloud computing to create a seamles integration between offline machines and our online payment
recet_project_content_p: Utilizing our self-service vending machine cloud payment system we combine physical machines and cloud computing to create a better integration. In addition to our technological innovation, we not only develop the structure of the machine and the services it provides, but also focus on consumer experience innovation, and the business service of machine integration.
project_desc_1_p: Remotely control game machines with our IOT streaming system. With chat room, shopping, and ranking system feature
project_desc_2_p: Cloud payment system of self-service vending machine with advertising promotion and cloud audit features. This app combines physical machines with cloud computing.
service_title_2: can help you improve your business
service_desc: Win Pro Cloud is an software research and development company that helps companies to integrate cloud computing, digital services, virtual reality, cloud payment on their products. We can also help to customized design of online platforms or applications.
iot_content_h2: Remotely control machines with our IoT technology
iot_desc1: Allow players to actually operate the entertainment machine through mobile phones, computers, tablets and other communication tools remotely
iot_desc1_2: By using our IoT system, you can control your machines in real time. When you operate the mobile interface, you are also operating the physical machine
machine_desc: Through the IoT technology, consumers are not limited by time and place, and can immediately experience the fun of classic games by simply connecting to the Internet when they want to play
galaxy_game_container_p: You can play a variety of games such as, fruit bowls, slot machines, poker machines and many more to recall the happy times in the past
galaxy_social_p: You can chat publicly & privately with your friends in real time, learn from other people's playing experience, share the joy of winning, and also exchange gifts
galaxy_video_p: You can record your outstanding gaming performance by simply pressing the capture button at any time during playtime
module_h2: Our professional R&D engineering team can help you develop APPs according to your needs. If you are a game console manufacturer, we can also provide a platform to recommend consumers to play your game console.
galaxy_contact_h2: Want to create your own app?
about_hero_h2: Established in the midsummer of 2017, Win Pro Cloud focuses on manufacturing physical arcade game consoles, researching and developing cloud computing, digital services, virtual and mixed reality integration, and cloud payment integration. The rise of self-service stores has given our company the room to compete in a wider market, and we expect to lead in our industry with our experience.
line_hero_description: Precise statistics - Assist in market analysis
line_card_p_1: Assist stores to apply for @official accounts, not only collect customer lists, but also interact with customers at any time, receive consultations, product orders, and even hold interactive events, creating an unprecedented interaction mode.
line_card_p_2: Interact with all your customers through your official account, including new events, offers or relevant information about the store. Keep all customers updated with the latest news.
line_card_p_3: Hold various special events, such as: new products, promotions, visual promotion, etc
line_card_p_4: Winback customers back through marketing promotions. Establishing customer service capabilities to receive customer feedback immediately, which helps optimize service and increase customer loyalty and retention rate.
line_special_desc_h3_1: We have a dedicated R&D team to customize products that suits you
line_special_desc_p_1: We have our own engineer team which specializes design an online platform or app according to your needs.
line_service_card_top_p_1: Establish an exclusive official LINE BOT life circle for stores, stores can use LINE BOT to attract fans, manage and analyze consumer data in the LINE BOT backstage.
line_service_card_top_p_2: By scanning the QR code of the machine and playing it for free once, consumers can get the store's preset promotions after joining the official LINE account.
search_service_text_p: Instantly provide management reports, improve the efficiency of financial and inventory management, provide data security backup and flexible computing. Immediately insight into customer needs and business opportunities.
search_revenue_desc_p: The list displays information such as current day's income as well as expenses and total income, expenses and items, allowing managers to create their own style.
search_language_p: Currently supports Traditional and Simplified Chinese, English, and Vietnamese
search_internet_p: With our efficient development, devices can be quickly connected to the Internet, which is convenient and efficient
ipick_feature_card_p_1: Displays list of names and locations of available stores where the audit system module is installed, you can also check the revenue of the store through the system
ipick_feature_card_p_2: When the gift quantity falls below a certain amount, the system will push a message to the merchant, avoiding the impact on revenue due to insufficient inventory
ipick_feature_card_p_3: The list will display the names of all the machines in the store that have installed the audit system, you can query the revenue information of a specific machine separately, and display the total income  and expenses of the store
search_provide_content: Services that our platform can provide
search_provide_card_p_1: Based on the time period you choose, you can get the current revenue status at any time, and you can also query the automatic update history in the list
search_provide_card_p_2: The database can store revenue data, allowing you to easily find past historical data
search_provide_card_p_3: Immediately understand the operation status of the equipment, automatically notify when abnormality occurs, and remotely adjust the parameters and unit price to achieve a more efficient management
ipick_feature1_p: There is a free area and a paid area, where you can accumulate points in the free area and exchange points in the mall.
ipick_feature2_p_1: The winning record has a video for members to share  skills. The ranking includes the number of times in the current month and week.
ipick_feature2_p_2: While playing or waiting to play, you can discuss and chat with other players. Share each other's play experiences.
ipick_feature2_p_3: There are cash points and free points. You can view loot, delivery and point history, and so on.
ipick_advantage_item_p_1: You can enjoy the joy of the crane machine with others at home.
ipick_advantage_item_p_2: Through the online crane machine, you can chat with friends and send gifts .
ipick_advantage_item_p_3: In addition to playing, we can also watch other people's live broadcasts.
ipick_advantage_item_p_4: Operate physical machine remotely so users can play wherever and whenever they want.
xiaodi_description_1: Order food online and join our amazing
carousel_desc_item_p_1: Filter through your fav foods with our powerful filter system
carousel_desc_item_p_3: Save the restaurants you like to save time for searching it.
carousel_desc_item_p_4: Display delivery time instantly and accurately
carousel_desc_item_p_5: Track the status of your order and know where your order is going
carousel_desc_item2_p_1: Use your free time easily and earn extra money.
carousel_desc_item2_p_2: Press a button to accept or reject orders, go online, offline, it's quickly and easily
carousel_desc_item2_p_3: won't  miss the meal's status information
carousel_desc_item2_p_4: Display the delivery distance and keep tracking
carousel_desc_item2_p_5: You can check the weather forecast to arrange your own delivery strategy.
carousel_desc_item2_p_6: Convenient access to benefits and expenses statement
resto_content_desc_1: The operation interface clearly classifies the order level 、content and grasps the notification of the order immediately.
resto_content_desc_2: Multiple filters are available to find exactly meal you want to modify.
resto_content_desc_3: Save more time with our convenient, secure, and blazing fast login system.
delivery_desc: The team is committed to developing safe and reliable delivery services with a spirit of innovation, We are currently operating in Central District and the North District of Taiwan, and will continue to expand to all parts of the country in the future
